@realDonaldTrump #COVID19 &some events are doubling pace every week.
Sometimes events happens faster than brains.But soon brains takeover events.Demons live in many guise. But advance alertness acts as sixth sense &avoids many hazards. This is how 1 can change own future.@nsitharaman @AbeShinzo
